alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:32PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lander and west central Eureka Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1232 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Crescent Valley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Tenabo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
